summary: Request for a clean API to intentionally fail activities in long-polling patterns without generating excessive WARN-level logs. The activity should support retryable failures when no new data is available.
userImpact: Users polling external services experience noisy WARN-level logs for intentional activity failures, making error monitoring less effective.
proposedFix: Add a specific API for activities to intentionally fail: could be a special exception type (similar to CompleteAsyncError), special return value, or context function (similar to continueAsNew())
keyQuote: It would be nice to have a specific API for activities to "intentionally fail so that the activity task is retried", which would not cause extra logging.
